org.apache.river.qa.harness

Class NonActivatableGroupAdmin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.qa.harness.AbstractServiceAdmin
      • org.apache.river.qa.harness.NonActivatableGroupAdmin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Admin

    public class NonActivatableGroupAdmin
extends AbstractServiceAdmin
implements Admin
    An Admin which manages a NonActivatableGroup. The group is started in a separate VM and should be packaged in its own minimized JAR file to avoid class loader conflicts.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • NonActivatableGroupAdmin

        public NonActivatableGroupAdmin(QAConfig config,
                                String serviceName,
                                int index,
                                String[] options,
                                String[] properties)
        Construct an instance of NonActivatableGroupAdmin. This constructor is called to create a group admin for a group which will be private to a single service. The given service options and properties are merged with the options and properties defined for the group.
        Parameters:
        config - the configuration object for this test run
        serviceName - the name of the group managed by this admin
        index - the instance number for this service.
        options - the service options
        properties - the service properties

      • NonActivatableGroupAdmin

        public NonActivatableGroupAdmin(QAConfig config,
                                String serviceName,
                                int index)
        Construct an instance of NonActivatableGroupAdmin. This constructor is called to create a group which is intended to be shared among multiple nonactivatable services.
        Parameters:
        config - the configuration object for this test run
        serviceName - the name of the group managed by this admin
        index - the instance number for this service.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
           throws RemoteException,
                  TestException
        Start the group managed by this admin. A command line is constructed based on the service properties associated with this group. A VM is exec'd, and an object is read from the child process System.err stream which is expected to be a MarshalledObject containing the serialized proxy for the NonActivatableGroup instance provided by that VM. No further input is read from the child System.err. It is assumed that the child will write any output originally destined to System.err to its System.out stream.
        Specified by:
        start in interface Admin
        Throws:
        TestException - if the child process could not be exec'd or if an I/O error occurs reading the childs proxy or if the childs proxy class could not be found
        RemoteException - never

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws RemoteException
        Stop the group. Start a destroy thread which has a two-second delay before calling System.exit to allow the call to return.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface Admin
        Throws:
        RemoteException - if a communication error occurs when the groups stop method is called

      • getProxy

        public Object getProxy()
        Return the proxy for the NonActivatableGroup managed by this admin.
        Specified by:
        getProxy in interface Admin
        Returns:
        the NonActivatableGroup proxy
